attributes.action: withdraw the United Kingdom from the European Union and return legislative decisions to Parliament.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Good relations with continental neighbours can be fostered without bureaucratic Brussels forcing unwanted laws on the British people. The Common Market was a reasonable idea, but the referendum that led us to join was not designed to lead us into loss of nationhood or self determination.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
